page.title: 15MONTACUTE TODAY
page.content: On Thursday a Mr. & Mrs. competition was held in the village hall.Then came the day which was to end the climax to the carnival week.Today the actual carnival procession took place with a barbecue & a disco to follow. Today is Sunday, 10:30 a.m.I have just woke up and have decided to look through my binoculars at the Norman Tower which stands on St. Micheal's Hill.I have a marvellous view as my window is situated vertically opposite the tower.It is so peacefull up here , admiring the excellent craftsmanship that has gone into the building of the tower.Smothering the tower are hundred upon hundred of trees each at their peak.A few hundred yards away from my house is the West Drive of the famous Montacute House. {MORE>
